dashboard.title: Timesheet
dashboard.noProjectsDescription: Ask your admin to create projects to start tracking time.
dashboard.submittedBanner: Submitted for approval. Waiting for admin review.
dashboard.lockedBanner: Week locked for invoicing. No changes allowed.
dashboard.entryReadOnly: This entry is {status} and cannot be edited.
dashboard.submitWeekDescription: Submit all entries for {dates} for admin approval? You won't be able to edit them until an admin approves or rejects them.
dashboard.viewingEmployeeTimesheet: Viewing {name}'s timesheet. Entries created here will be logged under their account.
dashboard.roundTripDescription: Distance will be doubled to account for the return journey
dashboard.projectLockedDesc: Contact your admin to make changes

projects.title: Projects
projects.noProjectsDescription: Create your first project to get started.
projects.noMatchingProjects: No projects match the current filters.
projects.deleteProjectConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {name}? This will also delete all associated time entries. This action cannot be undone.
projects.employeeRatesDescription: Each person uses their own rate
projects.noCompanyRate: Set a default hourly rate in Admin to use company rate mode.

team.title: Team
team.invitationFailed: Member added but invitation email could not be sent
team.removeMemberConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove {name}? They will lose access immediately. All their time entries, expenses, and project data will be kept for company records.
team.isHourlyDescription: Paid per hour. Flex balance and vacation accrual are disabled.

admin.title: Admin Dashboard
admin.noMembersDescription: Add team members to see profitability data.
admin.economicDescription: Export billable time entries as a CSV file formatted for e-conomic's journal import (Kassekladde).
admin.saveRevenueFirst: Save a revenue account number before exporting.
admin.noBudgetProjects: No projects with budget hours set
admin.allocateDescription: Assign budget hours to team members for {project}
admin.defaultHourlyRateDesc: Used to estimate hours for fixed-price projects
admin.masterCurrencyDescription: All employee rates, cost rates, and project prices are stored in this currency.
admin.changeMasterCurrencyWarning: Changing the master currency will NOT convert existing rates and prices. All values will remain as their current numbers but be interpreted as the new currency. Update all rates manually if needed.
admin.universalBillRateDesc: When enabled, all employees are billed at the same rate. Freelancers keep their individual rates.
admin.aiAnonymizationDesc: When enabled, employee and project names are replaced with anonymous labels before sending to the AI. No personally identifiable information leaves your system.
admin.autoApproveDescription: Expenses below this amount will be automatically approved.
admin.companyExpensesDescription: Manage recurring and one-time company overhead costs.
admin.downloadReceiptsDesc: Download all expense receipts as ZIP
admin.noReceipts: No receipts found in this period
admin.companyLogoDesc: Upload your company logo. It will appear on the dashboard and in exports. Supports SVG, PNG, JPG (max 2MB).
admin.denyReasonPlaceholder: Explain why the request is denied...
admin.absenceReasonsDesc: Configure the reasons employees can select when registering absence.
admin.selectEmployeesForReason: Select which employees can use this absence reason.
admin.lockProject: Lock - Employees can't add/edit time entries
admin.unlockProject: Unlock - Allow employees to add/edit again
admin.unarchiveProject: Unarchive - Make visible to employees again
admin.holidaysDesc: Manage public holidays for your company.

approvals.title: Approvals
approvals.rejectPlaceholder: Let the employee know what needs to be changed...
approvals.reopenPlaceholder: Explain why these entries are being reopened...

vacations.title: Vacations
vacations.noRequestsDescription: Click "Request Vacation" to submit your first request.
vacations.hourlyNoAccrual: Vacation accrual is not applicable for hourly employees. Contact your administrator for vacation arrangements.
vacations.hoursCost: This will use approx. {hours} vacation hours ({days} days × {perDay}h/day)

backups.title: Backups & Export
backups.fullExportDescription: Download a complete backup of your company data as a ZIP file containing CSV exports of all users, projects, and time entries.
backups.dataInfoDescription: Your data is stored securely and backed up automatically. Manual exports give you a portable copy of all your company data.
backups.formatDescription: CSV files in a ZIP archive, compatible with Excel, Google Sheets, and other tools.
backups.scopeDescription: Exports all data for your company. Personal data is limited to company members only.

auditLog.title: Audit Log
auditLog.noLogsDescription: No audit events match the current filters.

onboarding.setupDescription: Let's set up your company to get started.
onboarding.masterCurrencyDescription: The currency all rates and prices will be stored in.

landing.heroSubtitle: The modern time tracking platform built for agencies and consultancies. Know exactly where your time goes and how profitable each project is.
landing.problemTitle: Time Tracking Shouldn't Be This Hard
landing.problemSubtitle: Most teams struggle with these common challenges.
landing.lostHoursDesc: Teams waste hours every week on manual time tracking with spreadsheets and outdated tools.
landing.invisibleCostsDesc: Without real-time profitability data, unprofitable projects drain your bottom line silently.
landing.teamBlindSpotsDesc: Managers can't see who's overloaded and who has capacity, leading to burnout and missed deadlines.
landing.featuresTitle: Everything You Need to Track Time
landing.featuresSubtitle: Powerful features designed for modern teams.
landing.oneClickEntryDesc: Log hours in seconds with our intuitive weekly timesheet grid. No more forgetting to track time.
landing.realTimeProfitabilityDesc: See revenue, costs, and profit per employee and project instantly. Make data-driven decisions.
landing.teamManagementDesc: Manage your team, set rates, track utilization, and export data backups with ease.
landing.pricingSubtitle: Per user, per month. No hidden fees.
landing.freeDesc: Perfect for freelancers and trying things out.
landing.proDesc: For growing teams that need advanced features.
landing.ctaTitle: Ready to Take Control of Your Time?
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join teams who track smarter, not harder. Start your free trial today.
landing.earlyAccessDesc: All features are free during our early access period. No credit card required.

legal.cookieConsentText: We use cookies to ensure the best experience. Essential cookies are required for the site to function.
legal.privacyIntro: Cloud Timer ("we", "our", "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.
legal.whatWeCollectDesc: We collect information you provide when creating an account and using our service, including: name, email address, company information, time entries, project data, expense records, and uploaded files (receipts, contracts).
legal.howWeUseDesc: Your data is used to provide and improve our service, including: time tracking, project management, analytics, expense tracking, and team collaboration features. We do not sell your data to third parties.
legal.thirdPartiesDesc: We use the following third-party services to operate Cloud Timer:
legal.dataRetentionDesc: Your data is retained for as long as your account is active. You can request deletion of your account and all associated data at any time by contacting us.
legal.gdprRightsDesc: Under the General Data Protection Regulation, you have the right to:
legal.gdprObject: Object to processing of your data
legal.contactDesc: For any privacy-related questions, please contact us at:
legal.cookieIntro: This policy explains how Cloud Timer uses cookies and similar technologies.
legal.whatAreCookiesDesc: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help the site remember your preferences and improve your experience.
legal.essentialCookiesDesc: These cookies are required for the site to function and cannot be disabled. They include:
legal.optionalCookiesDesc: We currently do not use any optional or tracking cookies. If this changes in the future, we will update this policy and request your consent.
legal.manageCookiesDesc: You can manage cookies through your browser settings. Note that disabling essential cookies may prevent the site from functioning correctly. You can also withdraw your cookie consent by clearing your browser's local storage for this site.
legal.policyChangesDesc: We may update this policy from time to time. Any changes will be reflected on this page with an updated date.
legal.governingLawDesc: These terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Denmark. Any disputes shall be resolved in Copenhagen City Court (Københavns Byret).
legal.datatilsynet: You have the right to lodge a complaint with the Danish Data Protection Agency (Datatilsynet) at datatilsynet.dk.
legal.subProcessorsDesc: We use the following sub-processors to deliver our service:
legal.subVercel: Vercel Inc. — Hosting, serverless functions, file storage — USA (EU-US Data Privacy Framework)
legal.subNeon: Neon Inc. — PostgreSQL database hosting — USA (EU-US Data Privacy Framework)
legal.subClerk: Clerk Inc. — Authentication and user management — USA (EU-US Data Privacy Framework)
legal.subAnthropic: Anthropic PBC — AI-powered contract analysis (optional) — USA (EU-US Data Privacy Framework)
legal.retentionNotice: Financial records (expenses, receipts) are retained for 5 years after finalization in compliance with Bogføringsloven § 10.
legal.amendmentReasonPlaceholder: Explain why this finalized expense is being changed...
legal.amendmentReasonRequired: An amendment reason is required for finalized expenses
legal.voidReasonPlaceholder: Explain why this expense is being voided...
legal.consentDesc: Your employer uses Cloud Timer to track working hours. Before you continue, please review what data we collect and process:
legal.consentFooter: Your data is processed in accordance with our {privacy} and {terms}. You can request a copy or deletion of your data at any time via Settings.
legal.termsIntro: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of Cloud Timer, a time tracking and project management platform.
legal.termsServiceDesc: Cloud Timer is a cloud-based SaaS platform for time tracking, expense management, project management, and team collaboration.
legal.termsAccountDesc: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities under your account. You must provide accurate information during registration.
legal.termsAcceptableUseDesc: You agree to use Cloud Timer only for lawful purposes. You must not upload malicious content, attempt to gain unauthorized access, or use the service to violate any applicable laws.
legal.termsDataOwnershipDesc: You retain full ownership of all data you enter into Cloud Timer. We do not claim any intellectual property rights over your content. Your data is yours.
legal.termsServiceLevelDesc: We strive to maintain high availability but do not guarantee specific uptime percentages. The service is provided on a best-effort basis.
legal.termsLiabilityDesc: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Cloud Timer shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the service.
legal.termsTerminationDesc: You may terminate your account at any time. Upon termination, you can export your data via the built-in export feature. After account deletion, personal data is removed while financial records are retained for 5 years per Bogføringsloven.
legal.termsDisputeDesc: Any disputes arising from these terms shall be resolved in Copenhagen City Court (Københavns Byret) under Danish law.
legal.dpaIntro: This Data Processing Agreement ("DPA") is entered into between the Customer ("Data Controller") and Cloud Timer ("Data Processor") in accordance with GDPR Article 28.
legal.dpaRolesDesc: The Customer (employer/company) is the Data Controller. Cloud Timer acts as the Data Processor, processing personal data on behalf of the Controller.
legal.dpaDataTypesDesc: We process the following categories of personal data: names, email addresses, work hours, time entries, expense records, receipt files, vacation requests, and employment information.
legal.dpaPurposeDesc: Data is processed solely to provide the Cloud Timer service: time tracking, expense management, project management, analytics, and team collaboration.
legal.dpaSecurityDesc: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures including: encryption in transit (TLS), encryption at rest, access controls, regular security reviews, and secure sub-processor agreements.
legal.dpaBreachDesc: In the event of a personal data breach, we will notify the Data Controller without undue delay, and no later than 72 hours after becoming aware of the breach, in accordance with GDPR Article 33.
legal.dpaDeletionDesc: Upon termination of the service agreement, we will delete or return all personal data within 30 days, except where retention is required by law (e.g., Bogføringsloven).
legal.dpaAuditDesc: The Data Controller has the right to audit our compliance with this DPA. We will provide reasonable assistance and access to relevant information upon written request.
legal.dpaTransferDesc: Some sub-processors are located in the USA. Transfers are safeguarded under the EU-US Data Privacy Framework and Standard Contractual Clauses where applicable.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.noData: No data available for this period
analytics.budgetRequired: This chart requires a project with budget hours set
analytics.notYetInvoiced: Approved but not yet locked for invoicing
analytics.revenueVsOverheadDesc: Monthly revenue, overhead costs, and contribution margin
analytics.nonBillableTrendDesc: Percentage of non-billable hours by category over time
analytics.unbilledWorkAgingDesc: Approved billable work not yet locked for invoicing
analytics.expenseBreakdownDesc: Project and company expenses by category over time

resourcePlanner.title: Resource Planner
resourcePlanner.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this allocation?
resourcePlanner.rolloverNote: Unlogged hours will roll over to remaining days
resourcePlanner.desktopRecommended: Desktop recommended for the best experience

timeline.title: Project Timeline
timeline.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this milestone?
timeline.noActivities: No activities yet. Click + to add one.

ai.title: AI Assistant
ai.subtitle: Your friendly business advisor — insights from your contracts and time data
ai.noInsightsDescription: No new insights right now. Check back later or click refresh to generate new ones.
ai.howItWorksDescription: I analyze your uploaded contracts alongside your team's time entries to spot opportunities, flag potential issues early, and celebrate wins. I refresh daily, or you can trigger a refresh manually.

contracts.title: Contracts
contracts.noContractsDescription: Upload a PDF or Word document to attach contract terms to this project.
contracts.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this contract? Extracted terms will be lost.
contracts.scannedPdfMessage: This PDF appears to be scanned. Anonymization can't be guaranteed for scanned documents. Would you like to proceed without anonymization, or enter the contract terms manually?
contracts.scopePlaceholder: Brief description of the project scope...
contracts.encryptingMessage: Encrypting your file and keeping your data safe...
contracts.scopeAdditionsPlaceholder: Add any additional notes, clarifications, or amendments to the scope...

superAdmin.title: Platform Admin
superAdmin.subtitle: Cross-company platform overview
superAdmin.noCompaniesDescription: Companies will appear here once users sign up.

expenses.title: Expenses
expenses.noExpensesDescription: Add expenses to track project costs.
expenses.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this expense?

companyExpenses.title: Company Expenses
companyExpenses.noExpensesDescription: Add recurring and one-time company expenses to track true overhead.

settings.title: Settings
settings.dataExportDesc: Download a copy of all your personal data stored in Cloud Timer.
settings.deleteAccountDesc: Submit a request to your company admin to delete your account. Your admin will review the request within 30 days.
settings.deleteReasonPlaceholder: Why do you want to delete your account?
settings.deletionPendingDesc: Your account deletion request was submitted on {date}. Your admin will review it within 30 days.
settings.deletionDeniedDesc: Your admin denied your deletion request. Reason: {reason}
settings.financialDataNotice: Financial data (expenses, receipts) will be anonymized but retained for 5 years per Danish law (Bogføringsloven).
settings.notificationsDesc: Choose which notifications you want to receive.
settings.notifyApprovalsDesc: When your time entries are approved or rejected.
settings.notifyVacationsDesc: When your vacation requests are approved or rejected.
settings.notifyWeeklyDigestDesc: Receive a weekly summary of your hours and balance.
settings.replayTourDesc: Take the guided tour again to discover features.

tour.welcomeDesc: Welcome to Cloud Timer! Let's take a quick tour to help you get started.
tour.timesheetDesc: This is your weekly timesheet. Click any cell to log hours against a project.
tour.statsDesc: These cards show your weekly target, billable hours, time balance, and vacation days at a glance.
tour.expensesDesc: Submit expense reports with receipts. Your admin will review and approve them.
tour.vacationsDesc: Request vacation days and see your remaining balance. Approved days update your flex balance automatically.
tour.projectsDesc: Create projects, set billing rates and budgets. The Timeline tab shows your project schedule at a glance.
tour.teamDesc: Invite team members, assign them to projects, and plan resources. The Resource Planner tab helps balance workloads.
tour.adminDesc: Your command center — Approvals, Vacations, and Backups are all organized as tabs here.
tour.analyticsDesc: View AI-powered analytics on team performance, project profitability, and trends.
tour.doneDesc: Start by creating your first project. You can replay this tour anytime from Settings.
tour.doneDescEmployee: Start logging your hours! You can replay this tour anytime from Settings.

setupTour.welcomeDesc: Now that you know the basics, let's configure your company settings for accurate tracking and billing.
setupTour.currencyDesc: Choose the master currency for all rates and prices. This is the foundation for all financial data.
setupTour.hourlyRateDesc: Set a default rate used for estimating hours on fixed-price projects and as a fallback rate.
setupTour.billRateDesc: Enable this to bill all employees at the same rate. Freelancers keep their individual rates.
setupTour.expenseSettingsDesc: Set a threshold to auto-approve small expenses. Saves time on routine reimbursements.
setupTour.doneDesc: Your company is configured. Approvals, Vacations, and Backups are all tabs within Admin. Next: create your first project in Projects, then invite your team in Team.
setupTour.companyExpensesDesc: Track recurring overhead like rent, software, and salaries. These costs factor into your profitability calculations.

projectsTour.welcomeDesc: This is where you create and manage all your projects. Let's walk through the key features.
projectsTour.tabsDesc: Switch between the project list and the visual timeline view using these tabs.
projectsTour.createBtnDesc: Click here to create a new project. Set its name, client, billing type, budget, and color.
projectsTour.tableDesc: See all your projects at a glance — client, budget, time entries, and status. Click the edit icon to modify any project.
projectsTour.timelineTabDesc: The Timeline tab shows a Gantt-style view of your projects with milestones and deadlines across months.
projectsTour.doneDesc: Create your first project to get started. Your team members will see it when logging time.

teamTour.welcomeDesc: Manage your team members and plan resource allocation. Let's see what's here.
teamTour.tabsDesc: Switch between the team member list and the resource planning view.
teamTour.inviteBtnDesc: Click here to invite a new team member. Set their role, rates, weekly target, and vacation days.
teamTour.tableDesc: See all your team members — their roles, bill and cost rates, and weekly targets. Click the edit icon to adjust settings.
teamTour.resourceTabDesc: The Resource Planner lets you drag-and-drop allocate team members to projects across weeks and months.
teamTour.doneDesc: Invite your team members and they'll be able to log time against your projects right away.

guides.dashboardDesc: This is where you log your working hours each week. Click cells to add time entries, then submit the week for approval.
guides.dashboardTip1: Click any cell to log time against a project
guides.dashboardTip2: Submit your week when all hours are entered
guides.dashboardTip3: Track your target vs actual hours in the stat cards
guides.projectsDesc: Create and configure projects for each client engagement. Set billing rates, budgets, and track profitability per project.
guides.projectsTip1: Create a project for each client engagement
guides.projectsTip2: Choose hourly or fixed-price billing per project
guides.projectsTip3: Upload contracts to track terms and deadlines
guides.teamDesc: Invite team members, set their roles, and configure individual billing and cost rates for accurate profitability tracking.
guides.teamTip1: Invite members with their email address
guides.teamTip2: Set bill and cost rates per person
guides.teamTip3: Adjust weekly targets and vacation days
guides.expensesDesc: Submit expense reports with receipts for reimbursement. Track the status of each submission through the approval process.
guides.expensesTip2: Submit draft expenses for admin approval
guides.expensesTip3: Track approval status of your submissions
guides.vacationsDesc: Submit vacation, sick leave, or personal day requests. Your remaining days are calculated automatically based on approved requests.
guides.vacationsTip1: Choose between vacation, sick, or personal leave
guides.analyticsDesc: Explore detailed insights on employee utilization, team performance, project profitability, and company-wide metrics.
guides.analyticsTip1: Switch between employee, team, project, and company views
guides.analyticsTip2: Adjust date range and granularity for different perspectives
guides.analyticsTip3: Toggle approved-only to see finalized data
guides.aiDesc: Your AI assistant analyzes contracts and time data to surface opportunities, flag potential issues, and celebrate wins.
guides.aiTip1: Insights refresh daily or click refresh manually
guides.aiTip2: Dismiss resolved insights to keep the list clean
guides.aiTip3: Use category filters to prioritize actions
guides.adminDesc: Your company command center. Monitor revenue, costs, profitability, and configure company-wide settings from here.
guides.adminTip1: Set rates and currency for accurate billing
guides.adminTip2: Monitor project budgets and team utilization
guides.approvalsDesc: Review and approve submitted time entries and expenses from your team. Reject with notes when changes are needed.
guides.approvalsTip1: Review time entries and expenses in separate tabs
guides.approvalsTip2: Reject with notes so employees know what to fix
guides.adminVacationsDesc: Approve or reject vacation and leave requests from your team. Check dates and business day counts before approving.
guides.adminVacationsTip1: Filter by status to find pending requests
guides.adminVacationsTip2: Check business day counts for accuracy
guides.adminVacationsTip3: Approve or reject with one click
guides.companyExpensesDesc: Track recurring and one-time company expenses. These factor into your overall profitability calculations.
guides.companyExpensesTip1: Add recurring expenses like rent and software
guides.backupsDesc: Export a complete backup of your company data including users, projects, and all time entries.
guides.backupsTip1: Download full company data as a ZIP file
guides.backupsTip2: Includes users, projects, and time entries as CSV
guides.backupsTip3: Compatible with Excel and Google Sheets
guides.settingsDesc: Manage your personal account settings, export your data, or request account deletion.
guides.settingsTip1: Export all your personal data anytime
guides.settingsTip2: Replay the guided tour to revisit features

infoTips.revenue: Total billable hours multiplied by each employee's bill rate for the selected week.
infoTips.utilization: Percentage of weekly target hours that were actually logged. 100% means the target was met.
infoTips.universalBillRate: When enabled, all employees (except freelancers) are billed at the same hourly rate. Freelancers always use their individual rate.
infoTips.autoApproveThreshold: Expenses below this amount are automatically approved when submitted, skipping admin review.
infoTips.revenueAccount: The account number in e-conomic where revenue from billable hours is posted (e.g. 1000).
infoTips.counterAccount: The offsetting account in e-conomic, typically a debtor or bank account (e.g. 5800).
infoTips.vatCode: The VAT/tax code used in e-conomic, e.g. U25 for 25% Danish VAT.
infoTips.billRate: The hourly rate charged to clients for this person's work.
infoTips.costRate: The internal cost per hour, typically based on salary. Used to calculate profit margin.
infoTips.employmentType: Employees use the company's universal bill rate (if enabled). Freelancers always keep their individual rate.
infoTips.pricingType: Hourly: billed per hour worked at the applicable rate. Fixed Price: a set project fee regardless of hours.
infoTips.expenseCategories: Rent: office/premises. Insurance: business policies. Utilities: electricity, water, internet. Software: SaaS/licenses. Salaries: wages and benefits. Other: miscellaneous.
infoTips.draftStatus: Created but not yet submitted for approval. You can still edit it.
infoTips.submittedStatus: Submitted and waiting for admin approval.
infoTips.approvedOnlyFilter: Show only approved and locked time entries. Excludes drafts and pending submissions.
infoTips.timeEntriesTab: Review and approve weekly timesheet submissions from team members.
infoTips.expensesTab: Review and approve expense reports submitted by team members.
infoTips.isHourly: Hourly employees are paid per hour worked. Flex balance and vacation accrual (2.08 days/month) are disabled.

support.requestPending: Cloud Timer support has requested access
support.requestPendingDesc: A platform administrator is requesting temporary access to help with your account.
support.supportActive: Cloud Timer support is accessing your company
support.supportActiveDesc: A platform administrator currently has temporary access to your company data.

phases.title: Project Phases
phases.description: Define phases that projects progress through (e.g., Planning, Design, Development, QA)
phases.deletePhaseConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"?
phases.deletePhaseInUse: This phase is used by {count} time entries. It will be deactivated instead of deleted.
phases.applyGlobally: Apply rename to all existing time entries
phases.applyGloballyDesc: Historical entries will be updated to use the new name
phases.migrationDesc: Assign existing projects to a starting phase or opt them out
phases.backfillDesc: Apply phase to existing time entries in a date range
phases.overlapError: Date ranges cannot overlap for the same project
phases.phaseDeactivated: Phase deactivated (in use by time entries)
phases.duplicateName: A phase with this name already exists
phases.finalPhaseDescription: This is the last phase for this project. Would you also like to archive the project and set it as inactive?

economicImport.title: Import from e-conomic
economicImport.uploadDescription: Upload the Projektkort Excel export (.xlsx) from e-conomic.
economicImport.dropzone: Drop .xlsx file here or click to browse
economicImport.invalidFile: Invalid file. Please upload a valid Projektkort .xlsx file.
economicImport.mapEmployeesDesc: Match each employee from the Excel file to a Cloud Timer team member.
economicImport.mapCategoriesDesc: Map e-conomic task categories to Cloud Timer project phases.
economicImport.unmappedWarning: {count} employee(s) not mapped — their entries will be skipped
economicImport.successMessage: Successfully imported {entries} time entries for {employees} employees

billing.title: Billing
billing.accountingNotice: Invoices created here are drafts for your accounting system (e-conomic, Billy, or Dinero). By Danish law, all invoices must be sent through a registered accounting system. Connect your system under Settings to sync drafts automatically.
billing.includeExpensesHint: Add approved, uninvoiced expenses from this project as separate lines
billing.footerNotePlaceholder: e.g. Late payment subject to interest at 2% per month.
billing.clientNamePlaceholder: Client name as used in projects
billing.noUninvoicedDesc: No uninvoiced approved billable hours found.
billing.noInvoicesDesc: Create your first invoice from the Uninvoiced tab.
billing.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this draft invoice?
billing.chooseSystem: Connect your accounting system to sync invoices automatically.
billing.economicDescription: Sign in to grant Cloud Timer access to your e-conomic account.
billing.dineroDescription: Sign in via Visma Connect to authorize access to Dinero.
billing.billyDescription: Enter your API credentials from Billy's settings.
billing.disconnectConfirm: Are you sure you want to disconnect your accounting system? Customer mappings will be kept.
billing.oauthError: Failed to connect. Please try again.
billing.oauthDenied: Authorization was denied. Please try again.
billing.oauthOrgError: Could not determine your organization. Please try again.
